de.lessvoid.niftyinternal.render.batch

Class LinearGradient

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.niftyinternal.render.batch.LinearGradient

  • public class LinearGradient
extends Object
    A linear gradient between two points that contains a number of color stops. This is a linear gradient as the renderer sees it. The points it carries are the resolved, e.g. NiftyNode coordinate system specific points.
    Author:
    void

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LinearGradient(double x0, double y0, double x1, double y1, NiftyLinearGradient gradient)
      Create a linear gradient considering the given rectangle (x0, y0) - (x1, y1) and the angle and colorstop from the NiftyLinearGradient.
      LinearGradient(LinearGradient src)
      Copy constructor.

        x0 - The x-coordinate of the rectangle
        y0 - The y-coordinate of the rectangle

        y1 - The y-coordinate of the rectangle

        public List<NiftyColorStop> getColorStops()
